thread.title: Justin Bieber Is Finally Back on Instagram - Justin Bieber Back on Instagram
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Is Finally Back on Instagram - Justin Bieber Back on Instagram

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Justin Bieber Is Finally Back on Instagram - Justin Bieber Back on Instagram
text:
In a move that's bound to excite teenage girls everywhere, Justin Bieber has returned to Instagram. The pop star was previously on a six-month hiatus from the appâ€•the last thing he posted was a video (of his adorable puppy) 24 weeks ago. He deactivated his account , deleting every post, shortly after the whole Selena Gomez comment war back in August. He gave fans some false hope when he appeared to reactivate his handle two weeks later, but that turned out to be an accident .
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below This afternoon, he quietly returned to the social media platform by posting his T-Mobile Super Bowl ad .
Let me see your #unlimitedmoves
A video posted by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Feb 3, 2017 at 2:07pm PST
All his previous photos are back on there, too. Happy stalking.
